root.name: Saint Seiya: Sanctuary Battle
root.description: OverviewIn the game, The Protagonists will fight the Gold Saints of the Twelve Palaces and defend Athena. There will be quests and 12 levelss in the games.CharactersCygnus HyogaDragon ShiryuAndromeda ShunPegasus SeiyaPhoenix IkkiEagle MarinOphiuchus Shaina
